title: Separate Head of a Cat Probably from a Small Sarcophagus
description:
Bronze head of a cat, hollow cast. Left ear pierced twice for an earring. A small depression in the top of the head (for an inlay ?). From a sarcophagus or statue. 

Condition: Surface worn; small holes in neck. Pieced together from several pieces. Patina is red to green.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
